sent.orig: Deaf of auditive nerve sex, doctor diagnose is already deaf, can you cure?
sent.trans: 耳朵神经性耳聋，医生确诊已经聋了，能治好吗？

sent.orig: But they are not deaf and they know they are not deaf.
sent.trans: 但是他们不聋而且他们自己也知道自己不聋。

sent.orig: Imagine all the deaf people, all the deaf people in the world.
sent.trans: 想想所有聋哑人，世界上所有的聋哑人。

sent.orig: He knew the finger alphabet, whereby the deaf and dumb communicate.
sent.trans: 他懂得聋哑人交流用的“盲文”。

sent.orig: Talking to him is like preaching to deaf ears. A real waste of time!
sent.trans: 你和他讲这些就如对牛弹琴，真是浪费时间！
